meanings.def: a place outside a film studio where scenes of a film are made
examples: location for something A mountain in the Rockies became the location for a film about Everest.
on location The movie was shot entirely on location in Italy.
the exotic locations they filmed in
He went to the restaurant to scout a location for his next film.

examples: A domain name is the location of your website on the internet.
